attributes.action: Educate the public on the appropriate use of the 999 "emergency" service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Countless hours and taxpayers money are expended upon responding to "emergencies". Many of these calls require common sense and appropriate responses. This emergency service is suffering an increase in workload due to the potential ease of abusing it.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Educate the public on the appropriate use of the 999 "emergency" service."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14436.asp

Prime Minister's Office
